Class.ClassComment: CacheEntryActivatedEvent /** * This event subtype is passed in to any method annotated with {@link org.infinispan.notifications.cachelistener.annotation.CacheEntryActivated}. * @author Manik Surtani * @since 4.0 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Retrieves the value of the entry being activated. * @return the value of the activated entry */
